turns.chat_text:
import graph;\
size(200,200);\
\
pair A = (0,0);\
pair B = (6,0);\
pair C = (8,4);\
pair D = (2,4);\
\
draw(A--B--C--D--cycle);\
\
label(\\\"A\\\",A,SW); label(\\\"B\\\",B,SE); label(\\\"C\\\",C,NE); label(\\\"D\\\",D,NW);\
label(\\\"6 units\\\", (A+B)/2, S);\
label(\\\"4 units\\\", (B+C)/2, E);\
